entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
